import './App.css'; import {useState} from "react"; function App() { // const [data, setData] = useState(null) const data = [ { time: "morning", temperature: "+10", fallout: "Туманно", imgPath: "" }, { time: "day", temperature: "+15", fallout: "Солнечно", imgPath: "" }, { time: "evening", temperature: "+5", fallout: "Пасмурно", imgPath: "" }, { time: "night", temperature: "0", fallout: "Дождливо", imgPath: "" } ] return (
{data.map(card => { `
card.temperature
card.fallout
` })}
+10
Туманно
+15
Солнечно
+12
Пасмурно
Дождь
); } export default App;
